DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : TAIWAN
DOC.TEXT: Industrial Output Increases : Gains in building activity and electronics production helped push national industrial production up 5.88 % on the year in the first_quarter , the Ministry of Economic Affairs said.Building activity , measured by construction work completed , gained 22.6 % on the year in the first_quarter . Production of electronics and information products increased 11.3 % for the period . Output of chemicals and metals also increased .
